name: Emily's Forest
description:
Official MolyJam Deux entry page

Guide your lost and hungry pooch down a mysterious forest path.  This game was created for MolyJam Deux (2013).  It uses an 'Infinite 2D zooming' technique inspired by Zoom Quilt: http://www.zoomquilt.org/

The game's theme was taken from the following Molydeux quote:

Imagine you're walking on a path - what's the path like? Imagine you go to the woods - what does the forest look like?

Controls

  • Arrow keys / WSAD / mouse to move
  • Space/LMB to jump.
  • Escape or Alt+F4 to quit (desktop versions).
